title: [BUG] Documentation build error with python=3.10 (update sphinx)
body:
### Issues Policy acknowledgement

- [X] I have read and agree to submit bug reports in accordance with the [issues policy](https://www.github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/master/ISSUE_POLICY.md)

### Willingness to contribute

Yes. I can contribute a fix for this bug independently.

### MLflow version

VERSION = "2.0.2.dev0"


### System information

- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: MacOS M1 12.03
- **Python version**: 3.10


### Describe the problem

Unable to build documentation because of **python=3.10** & **sphinx==3.5.4** incompatibility. The issue [has been fixed](https://github.com/sphinx-doc/sphinx/pull/9513) in the later versions of sphinx starting from `4.*.*`. Sphinx version can be updated in order to avoid this issue in future.


### Tracking information

_No response_

### Code to reproduce issue

```bash
cd docs
make livehtml
```

### Stack trace


```shell
> make livehtml                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       master [0b5269ee]
# Remove `--keep-going` option because `sphinx-autobuild` doesn't support it and raises an error.
# See: https://github.com/executablebooks/sphinx-autobuild/blob/master/src/sphinx_autobuild/build.py#L7
sphinx-autobuild -b html -d build/doctrees -W  -n -T source build/html
[sphinx-autobuild] > sphinx-build -b html -d build/doctrees -n -W -T /Users/rustem.galiullin/Projects/mlflow-dev/docs/source /Users/rustem.galiullin/Projects/mlflow-dev/docs/build/html
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/rustem.galiullin/opt/miniconda3/envs/mlflow-dev/lib/python3.10/runpy.py", line 196, in _run_module_as_main
    return _run_code(code, main_globals, None,
  File "/Users/rustem.galiullin/opt/miniconda3/envs/mlflow-dev/lib/python3.10/runpy.py", line 86, in _run_code
    exec(code, run_globals)
  File "/Users/rustem.galiullin/opt/miniconda3/envs/mlflow-dev/lib/python3.10/site-packages/sphinx/__main__.py", line 13, in <module>
    from sphinx.cmd.build import main
  File "/Users/rustem.galiullin/opt/miniconda3/envs/mlflow-dev/lib/python3.10/site-packages/sphinx/cmd/build.py", line 25, in <module>
    from sphinx.application import Sphinx
  File "/Users/rustem.galiullin/opt/miniconda3/envs/mlflow-dev/lib/python3.10/site-packages/sphinx/application.py", line 32, in <module>
    from sphinx.config import Config
  File "/Users/rustem.galiullin/opt/miniconda3/envs/mlflow-dev/lib/python3.10/site-packages/sphinx/config.py", line 23, in <module>
    from sphinx.util import logging
  File "/Users/rustem.galiullin/opt/miniconda3/envs/mlflow-dev/lib/python3.10/site-packages/sphinx/util/__init__.py", line 35, in <module>
    from sphinx.util import smartypants  # noqa
  File "/Users/rustem.galiullin/opt/miniconda3/envs/mlflow-dev/lib/python3.10/site-packages/sphinx/util/smartypants.py", line 33, in <module>
    from sphinx.util.docutils import __version_info__ as docutils_version
  File "/Users/rustem.galiullin/opt/miniconda3/envs/mlflow-dev/lib/python3.10/site-packages/sphinx/util/docutils.py", line 31, in <module>
    from sphinx.util.typing import RoleFunction
  File "/Users/rustem.galiullin/opt/miniconda3/envs/mlflow-dev/lib/python3.10/site-packages/sphinx/util/typing.py", line 34, in <module>
    from types import Union as types_Union
ImportError: cannot import name 'Union' from 'types' (/Users/rustem.galiullin/opt/miniconda3/envs/mlflow-dev/lib/python3.10/types.py)
Command exited with exit code: 1
```

### Other info / logs

_No response_

### What component(s) does this bug affect?

- [ ] `area/artifacts`: Artifact stores and artifact logging
- [ ] `area/build`: Build and test infrastructure for MLflow
- [X] `area/docs`: MLflow documentation pages
- [ ] `area/examples`: Example code
- [ ] `area/model-registry`: Model Registry service, APIs, and the fluent client calls for Model Registry
- [ ] `area/models`: MLmodel format, model serialization/deserialization, flavors
- [ ] `area/recipes`: Recipes, Recipe APIs, Recipe configs, Recipe Templates
- [ ] `area/projects`: MLproject format, project running backends
- [ ] `area/scoring`: MLflow Model server, model deployment tools, Spark UDFs
- [ ] `area/server-infra`: MLflow Tracking server backend
- [ ] `area/tracking`: Tracking Service, tracking client APIs, autologging

### What interface(s) does this bug affect?

- [ ] `area/uiux`: Front-end, user experience, plotting, JavaScript, JavaScript dev server
- [ ] `area/docker`: Docker use across MLflow's components, such as MLflow Projects and MLflow Models
- [ ] `area/sqlalchemy`: Use of SQLAlchemy in the Tracking Service or Model Registry
- [ ] `area/windows`: Windows support

### What language(s) does this bug affect?

- [ ] `language/r`: R APIs and clients
- [ ] `language/java`: Java APIs and clients
- [ ] `language/new`: Proposals for new client languages

### What integration(s) does this bug affect?

- [ ] `integrations/azure`: Azure and Azure ML integrations
- [ ] `integrations/sagemaker`: SageMaker integrations
- [ ] `integrations/databricks`: Databricks integrations
